name: Cloud Set Baked Setting & Smoothing Talc-Free Vegan Powder
about: What it is: A super soft, sheer setting & smoothing talc-free powder baked with skincare that sweeps away shine (not glow). Now in brightening shades...Coverage: Light.Finish: Natural.Formulation: Pressed Powder.Highlighted Ingredients: - Bamboo Stem Extract: Absorbs excess oil, leaving skin looking matte and feeling soft..- Passion-fruit Leaf Extract: Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles..- Chinese Peony: Visibly minimizes pores...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This formula starts as a mousse packed with skin-improving ingredients and is baked to achieve the perfect ultra-fine layer of sheer pigment. Unique airy texture gives your skin the most smooth, blurred, healthy look ever. New brightening shades erase dullness, under eyes or anywhere you need a boost. Non-comedogenic. Safe for sensitive skin...This product is non-irritating, clinically tested, hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic, ophthalmology tested, and safe for use around the eye...Clinical Results: Based on a consumer study of 32 females wearing  Cloud Set for 8 hours:.- 100% saw improved skin smoothness, texture and even skintone*.- 100% saw visible reduction in appearance of pores*.- 100% agreed it allows my skin to still look like real skin + doesn't look powdery, chalky, or dry**..*based on a clinical measurement study and a **consumer perception study on 32 women..CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -Bamboo Stem Extract: Absorbs excess oil, leaving skin soft and fresh. .-Passionfruit Leaf Extract: Smoothes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles..-Chinese Peony: Visibly minimizes pores. ..Mica, Silica, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Lauroyl Lysine, Glyceryl Stearate, Octyldodecanol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Pentylene Glycol, Glycerin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Potassium Sorbate, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Powder, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Aqua/Water/Eau, Stearic Acid, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire de Candelilla, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Phytate, Cetearyl Olivate, Tocopherol, Sorbitan Olivate, Honokiol, Paeonia Officinalis Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Sodium Benzoate [+/ -: CI 77492, CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 45410 (Red 28), CI 19140 (Yellow 5)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use a tapered brush to sweep or pat the powder onto your forehead, chin, and noseu2014or wherever you want to absorb oil or set makeup.
